column5: Just noticed your reply Rene, glad to hear you had a good trip as well! (we've definitely got to get together up there if possible)
Excellent report Mike too bad about the prop  I have a Quebec fishin licence you know I just need an invite oh and I know how to drive those SSV fishing boats
Awesome bud.. now that fishing!!    Accommodation's as well.. you can beat that!
great read,congrats on the trip
WTG Mike...looks like an awesome trip for sure.....believe me I know how wet and cold it was this weekend on the water....not nice, but atleast you caught fish  Jason
Great Report!  Sure is beautiful up there!
great report and story as always solo !  hopping beaver dams reminds me of a few of our honey holes we hit every year.  wonderful report.  jason
awesome post as always...I wish I had the will to drive to such remote locations....not to mention the 4cyl honda,  ....Gas is the most expensive part of every trip these days

Ok Mike...I have to admit, I was laughing right out loud at the prop thing....LOL.  Great report as always...they are always a pleasure to read!  Despite the weather, you guys had a trip to remember that's for sure.  Thanks for posting!
Life is Grand...what a fun read, excellent report.

Fantastic Read Solopaddler.  Oh man, that would stink - losing the whole dang prop and of course, so far from camp.  Good you didn't let it ruin your trip and there was a spare close by.   On our trips, I carry a spare with me - sure hope I never have to use it.  Greate report S/P and thanks for taking the time to post it.  Nice detailed reports like this make us feel as if we were there.
Excellent report and pics!!!  That prop incident was freaky!!!... I gotta go check mine now.
Great report as always! Glad everything worked out in the end for ya and some nice haul of fish
Excellent report Mike  Those walleye look super tasty.  Great pics and write up.
Great report and pics! Thanks for sharing.

Great report Mike! Sorry to hear about the prop, hate that feeling of being a drift with no power. Congrats on that mess of eyes TASTY! Always great to come home to a greeting like that.  Cheers, 1leg
Top to bottom, start to finish, PERFECT.  RAMMING BEAVER... too much fun.  Just as I come to expect from a Solo report.
Best Story I've read in a long time, bud. Tough beginning with a good ending. Those are the best. I actually have a vision of the look on your face after your prop dropped off.  hehehe  p.-
Hey Paul, you've got an open invitation to come up and fish some back lakes with me. It'd be nice if you could make it this year....  Thanks everyone for the positive comments!
Great report Mike - nice to smiles in all the pictures after the 'fun' you guys had
great job guys looks like a blast rain never hurt anyone wish i was there
Great report, not much of a walleye fan(other than eating them) but its good to see that you persevered in the face of adversity.
WTG Mike, fantastic read as usual. Great looking area up there.
Read it again.  Fantastic!

hey Mike sorry about the headache  good to see that you got into some nice pan fryers  on my way around that area i found myself in a clump with all the different weather wet as i would say and a lil cold   but managed lots of fish of different species (but no pics)  heres what was going on from day 1  all fish on 1/4 white 4" twister tail all i can say it was unbelievable but 3/4 of the fish i caught was bass and a few pickeral and pike im not to worried i had my lil guy with me at the time and kept a few for the pan biggest was 22 inch smallmouth released which i should of kept cause it was a good un and a real wall mounter but hey im a conservationist   anyways before i left we hit the kanasuta beer store and found this  this is my brothers friend who decided to pick up this 8.5 lbr from deserat who borrowed a picture from another dude who was there lol but a nice fish for sure  this is what the night finished of with enjoy  i woke up in the morning looking at snow flakes the size of golf balls coming down again i was to confused to find the camera it was all good see you around and good fishing   ill be back for sure enjoy
Ram the beaver ....there is now coffee on my keyboard........great read.
